alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:03PM EDT until August 12 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TRUMBULL COUNTY... At 503 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kinsman, or 9 miles northwest of Sharpsville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Kinsman, Orangeville and Yankee Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
